verbose_text: Approved SUA lowering treatments include xanthine oxidase inhibitors, such as allopurinol, which has been widely used for the treatment of gout since the 1960s [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR], in combination with low-dose, daily colchicine for the prophylaxis of flares [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: SUA-lowering treatments include xanthine oxidase inhibitors
